extendedInfo.description: Canterbury College Android app.              Students, parents and local businesses can now search the range of courses on offer and apply for places directly from their phone.The new app features an interactive guide to courses, updates on news and events, as well as a useful map of the Collegeâs new multimillion pound campus.Whether you are a school-leaver considering your next step, an adult thinking about returning to education, or an employer with training needs, you should download the Canterbury College app to access all the information you would ever need about one of the largest colleges in the South East.

reviews.title: Handy for current students and potential students
reviews.comment: Lots of course and contact info. Everything you need in one place.
reviews.author: A Google User
